ingredientList:
8 oz cream cheese, softened
½ cup brown sugar
1 tsp vanilla
recipeText: Mix together and refrigerate until ready to use.

ingredientList:
8 Roma (plum) tomatoes, diced
1/3 cup chopped fresh basil
1/4 cup shredded Parmesan cheese
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar
1 teaspoon olive oil
1/4 teaspoon kosher salt
1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
1 loaf French bread, toasted and sliced
recipeText:
In a bowl, toss together the tomatoes, basil, Parmesan cheese, and garlic. Mix in the balsamic vinegar, olive oil, kosher salt, and pepper. 

Let sit 1-2 hours in fridge before serving.

Serve on toasted bread slices.

*Don't overdo the balsamic vinegar and make sure the tomatoes and basil are very fresh.

ingredientList:
1 cup mayo
1 cup sour cream
1 lb bacon crispy and crumbled
4 roma tomatoes, diced
1 tsp Mrs. Dash original seasoning (Lawry's seasoned salt - is the original but makes it extra salty)
recipeText: Mix all ingredients and refrigerator for a few hours.

ingredientList:
1 pgk (8 oz) cream cheese softened
2 cups (8 oz) shredded Colby-Monterey Jack cheese - I add extra cheese
1/2 cup buffalo sauce
1/2 cup ranch salad dressing
2 cups of chicken - I add extra chicken
recipeText:
Mix together all ingredients and heat till hot.
Served best with tortilla chips

ingredientList:
2 pkg (8 oz) cream cheese, softened
1 pkg shredded sharp cheddar cheese
1 tbsp finely chopped onions
1 tbsp. Chopped red bell peppers
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. Lemon juice
dash ground red pepper (cayenne)
1 cup chopped toasted planters pecans
recipeText:
Beat cream cheese and cheddar in small bowl with mixer until well blended.
Add all remaining ingredients except nuts; mix well. Refrigerate several hours
Shape into ball; roll in nuts serve with ritz crackers

Makes 3 cups or 24 servings (2 tbsp each)

ingredientList:
1 tbls cilantro
2 tbsp butter
1 (15 oz) can of corn or frozen sweet corn
1/8 tsp garlic powder
1/2 tsp chili powder
1/8 tsp ground black pepper
1/2 cup milk
1/4 cup sour cream
2 Tbs diced mild green chiles
2 oz cream cheese
1/2 shredded mexican cheese blend - I always add more
tortilla chips
recipeText:
Melt butter in skillet over medium-high heat.

Drain corn. Add corn, garlic powder, chili powder, pepper, and 1/4 tsp salt to skillet.

Cook corn, stirring occasionally until lightly browned, 7-9 minutes.

Turn heat to medium-low. Add milk, sour cream, and green chiles. Cook 1 minute.

Add cream cheese and mexican cheese. Stir until melted. Turn off heat.

Garnish with ciantro. Serve with tortilla chips

ingredientList:
9 oz frozen spinach
1 can artichoke hearts
8 oz cream cheese
3/4 cup mozzarella cheese
1/2 cup parmesan cheese
1/4 cup milk
pinch of salt and pepper
recipeText: Combine all and cook on high 2 hours, stir occasionally.

ingredientList:
8 oz cream cheese
1 cup cucumbers
¼ cup chopped onion
recipeText:
Mix ingredients.

Serve with bagel chips

ingredientList:
1 tube sugar cookie dough (homemade or store bought)            
8 ounces cream cheese                                           
1/3 cup sugar                                                   
Pineapple tidbit                                                
Kiwi fruit                                                      
Strawberries                                                    
Blueberries
recipeText: Spread sugar cookie dough on pizza pan.  Bake as directed.  Cool crust to room temperature.  Mix cream cheese with sugar to taste as you wish.  Right before serving, spread cream cheese mixture over cookie dough crust.  Top with fruit of your choice. For fancy snacks, use digestive biscuits or small sugar cookies instead of making crust on pizza pan.

ingredientList:
Fruit Salsa
2 Granny Smith Apples
1 pkg strawberries
4 kiwi
2 tbs of apple jelly

Tortilla Chips
white sugar
cinnamon
recipeText:
Fruit Salsa
Chop all together

Tortilla Chips
Take and brush with water
sprinkle with white sugar and cinnamon/cut with pizza cutter
Bake at 350 degrees for 5 minutes or so until brown

ingredientList:
2 pounds ground beef
1/2 of an onion

1 10 3/4-ounce can cream of mushroom soup
1 10 3/4-ounce can cream of chicken soup
1 jar of homemade salsa AND 1 pound of Bongards yellow cheese OR 1 pound Mexican cheese
recipeText: Brown hamburger and onion, drain grease.  Mix in soups and cheese until cheese is melted and ingredients are hot.

ingredientList:
1 loaf frozen white bread dough
8 ounces softened cream cheese
Italian seasoning
Mozzarella cheese 
Pepper jack cheese
Bacon bits
Sliced pickled jalapeno peppers
recipeText:
Thaw bread dough in refrigerator.  Remove from fridge and let rise on the counter.  Roll out and cut to the size of desired pizza roll size.
  
Spread cream cheese on dough, sprinkle with Italian seasoning. 

Lay on slices of pepper jack cheese, sprinkle on bacon bits, cover with mozzarella cheese.
 
Bake at 400 degrees for 14 to 18 minutes or until edges are slightly brown.

recipeDescription: Used this for chips. It was good.
ingredientList:
1 pound frozen french fries or Chips
1 tablespoon butter
1 tablespoon flour
1 cup milk
1 cup shredded pepper Jack cheese (4 oz.)
recipeText:
Prepare fries according to package directions.

Melt butter in a small saucepan over medium heat. Whisk in flour; cook for 1 - 2 minutes.

Gradually add milk, whisking until smooth. Bring mixture to a boil; reduce heat and simmer mixture for 5 minutes.

Whisk in cheese until melted. Spoon sauce over fries.

ingredientList:
8 oz cream cheese @ room temperature
2 cup powdered sugar
1 cup (15 oz) pure pumpkin (NOT pie filling)
1 tsp ground cinnamon
1 tsp ground ginger
recipeText: Beat cream cheese, powdered sugar until smooth, add pumpkin and spies. Pour into air tight container and chill at least 8 hours. If too stiff set out a bit. Serve with gingersnaps, or graham cracker sticks, cinnamon or regular.

ingredientList:
16 ounces cream cheese
1 envelope dry Hidden Valley Ranch Dressing mix
1 cup grated Cheddar, co-jack or Colby cheese
Bacon bits
recipeText: Mix cream cheese, dressing mix and cheese together and form into a ball. Roll in bacon bits. Chill and serve with crackers.

ingredientList:
8 cups Kellogg's Crispix cereal
1 1/2 cups goldfish crackers
1 cup small pretzel sticks or twists
3 tablespoons vegetable oil
1 packet Hidden Valley Ranch Dressing Mix
recipeText:
In a 2 gallon zipper storage bag, combine crispix, cheese-its, and pretzels.  
Pour oil mixture over top.  Close bag and gently toss until evenly coated. 
 
Add packet of ranch dip mix.  Close bag and gently toss.
Store in airtight container.

ingredientList:
1/2 onion
1 jalapeno pepper (with seeds) or serrano pepper
2 cloves garlic
1/2 tablespoon cilantro
6 roma tomatoes
1 teaspoon salt
recipeText: Process all ingredients in food processor.  Chill before use.

recipeDescription: From Alice Lendt. These are so yummy, a child favorite!
ingredientList:
4 - 6 apples
1 1/2 cups water
2 cups sugar
1/2 cup vinegar
6 whole cloves
1 - 2 sticks cinnamon
Red food coloring
recipeText:
Wash, peel, and core apples.  Slice them 1/2 inch thick.
Make a syrup of the sugar, water, and vinegar.  Tied cloves and cinnamon in a bag.  Cook the apples and spices in the syrup, turning often until the fruit is clear.
Remove the apples and spice bag from the mixture.
Add red food coloring to the syrup.  Pour the syrup over the apples.  Cool.  Makes 12 - 16 rings.

ingredientList:
pkg of smoky wieners
bacon
1 cup brown sugar
1 tbsp vinegar
recipeText: 1/3 piece of bacon wrapped around each wiener and seam side down. Mix together 1 loosely packed cup of brown sugar and 1 tbsp of vinegar. Sprinkle on the wieners/bacon and bake in oven at 350 degrees for 45 minutes to 1 hour.  Can bake the night before and reheat the next day.

ingredientList:
1 small pkg mexican velveta
¼ cup milk
1 jar chopped pimentos
1 small onion-diced
1 pkg frozen chopped spinich (drain well)
10 oz sour cream
recipeText:
Melt cheese over low heat, stir in milk, pimentos and onions. Heat until smooth, add spinach just before serving add sour cream.

Serve with tortilla chips

ingredientList:
2 cups Parmesan cheese
1 box frozen spinach, thawed and drained
1 can plain artichoke hearts, cut up
2/3 cup sour cream
1 cup cream cheese
1/3 cup mayonnaise
2 teaspoons minced garlic
recipeText:
Mix parmesan cheese, spinach, and artichoke hearts.

Combine remaining ingredients and then mix with mixture in step 1. 

Bake at 375 degrees for 20-30 minutes.   

Serve with crackers or chips

ingredientList:
Sweet potatoes
olive oil
Mrs Dash Herb and Garlic seasoning
recipeText: Cut potato into french fry slices. Take a zip lock bag and put a little olive oil in bag with Mrs. Dash Herb and Garlic. Shake potatoes until well coated. Bake at 375 degrees until brown.

ingredientList:
2 big ripe avocados, peeled and seed removed
8-ounce package cream cheese
8 ounces sour cream
Pinch garlic salt
1 1/2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese
1 1/2 cups diced tomatoes
1 1/2 cups shredded lettuce
picante sauce as desired
recipeText:
Mash and mix the avocados, cream cheese, sour cream, and garlic salt until creamy. Spread on a pizza pan.

Top with shredded cheese, diced tomatoes, shredded lettuce, and picante sauce.

ingredientList:
16 oz regular velveeta
16 oz cream cheese
4 cans hormel chili (2 cans with beans 2 without)
recipeText: Melt cheese and cream cheese and then add the chili. And them put it in the slow cooker.

ingredientList:
1 lb velveeta pasteurized prepared cheese product, cut into ½ inch cubes
1 can (10 oz) Ro*tell diced tomatoes & green chilies, undrained
1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
1/2 lb ground beef, cooked and drained
1/2 cup sliced green onions
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients except onions in a large microwave bowl.
Microwave on high 5 minutes, or until the velveeta is completely melted, stirring after 3 minutes. Stir in onions

Serve: with ritz crackers and assorted cut-up fresh vegetables

ingredientList:
1 pkg (8 oz) Neufchatel Cheese
1/4 cup pesto
1 plum tomato, chopped
1/4 cup finely shredded italian five cheese blend
Triscuit cracked pepper and olive oil crackers.
recipeText:
Heat grill to medium heat. Place unwrapped Neufchatel cheese on 8 inch square sheet of heavy-duty foil; top with pesto, tomatoes and shredded cheese.

Place foil on grill; cover with lid. Grill 8-10 minutes or until shredded cheese is melted and Neufchatel cheese is softened but still holding its shape.

Transfer foil to platter. Serve spread with crackers.

recipeName: Easy Peanut Butter & Chocolate Eclair Dessert
ingredientList:
1 3/4 cups cold milk
1 pkg (4 serving size) jell-o vanilla flavor instant pudding & pie filling
1/4 cup creamy peanut butter
1 tub (8 oz)cool whip, thawed
24 honey maid honey grahams
6 squares baker's semi-sweet baking chocolate
3 tbsp butter
recipeText:
Pour milk into large bowl. Add dry pudding mix. Beat with wire whisk 2 minutes or until well blended. Add peanut butter; mix well. Gently stir in whipped topping. Layer one-third of the grahams and half of the pudding mixture in 13x9 inch dish, breaking grahams as necessary to fit. Repeat layers. Top with remaining grahams

Microwave chocolate and butter in microwaveable bowl on high 2 minutes stirring after 1 minute. Stir until chocolate is completely melted and mixture is well blended. Spread immediately over grahams. 

Refrigerate at least 8 hours. Store in refrigerator.

recipeDescription: From May Carol, the best elementary school cook ever!
ingredientList:
18 ounces semisweet chocolate chips
3/4 cup peanut butter
3 cups peanuts
2 cups miniature marshmallows
recipeText:
Melt chocolate chips.  Add peanut butter.  Stir in peanuts & marshmallows.  Place in 9" X 13" pan and let cool.

(alternate: use 12 oz chocolate chips and 6 - 12 oz butterscotch chips.)

ingredientList:
8 1/2 honey maid honey grahams, broken in half (17 squares)
6 squares baker's semi-sweet baking chocolate
1/2 cup creamy peanut butter 
3 squares bakers Premium White Baking chocolate
recipeText:
Line 13x9 inch pan with foil, with ends of foil extending over sides of pan. Arrange grahams on  bottom of pan, cutting as needed to completely cover bottom of pan; set aside.

Microwave semi-sweet chocolate and peanut butter in medium microwaveable bowl on high 1 1/2 to 2 minutes or until chocolate is completely melted when stirred, stirring every 30 seconds. Stir until well blended. Pour over grahams; spread with spatula to cover completely. 

Repeat microwave melting steps with the chile chocolate. Drop spoonfuls of the white chocolate over chocolate-covered grahams. Immediately cut through the chocolate mixtures with knife several times for tiger stripe effect.

Refrigerate at least 1 hour or until firm. Use foil handles to remove dessert from pan. Peel off foil. Cut into bars store in tightly covered container in refrigerator.

ingredientList:
2 cups graham cracker crumbs
1/2 cup powdered sugar
1/2 cup margarine, melted
2 cups coconut
1 can Borden Eagle Brand Sweetened Condensed Milk
1 cup semisweet chocolate chips
4 bars Hershey's chocolate
recipeText:
Mix crackers, powdered sugar, and margarine.  Press in a 12" x 7-1/4" cookie sheet pan.  Bake at 325 degrees for 10 minutes.

Mix coconut and sweetened condensed milk.  Spread on hot crust, bake 10 minutes.

Melt the chocolate chips and chocolate bars.

Spread on hot coconut mix.

Sprinkle with almonds, if desired.

ingredientList:
2 cups graham cracker crumbs
1/2 cup melted butter
1/4 cup sugar
3 cups coconut
1 can sweetened condensed milk
1 tablespoon peanut butter
1 package semisweet chocolate chips
recipeText:
Mix cracker crumbs, sugar, and butter and press hard in a 9" x 13" pan.  Bake 10 minutes at 350 degrees.  

Mix together coconut and condensed milk and pour over crust.  Bake for an additional 15 minutes at 350 degrees.  

Melt chocolate chips.  Add peanut butter.  Pour mixture over the top of the bars.  Cool and eat!

ingredientList:
1 (12-ounce) bag semisweet chocolate chips
1 (12-ounce) bag butterscotch chips
1 1/2 cups peanut butter
1 cup miniature marshmallows
1 cup peanuts (optional: pecans or walnuts)
recipeText:
Melt the peanut butter, chocolate and butterscotch chips.  Mix in marshmallows and peanuts.  

Pour into a 9" x 13" pan.  Cool, cut, and eat.

ingredientList:
1 1/2 cups boiling water
1 cup oatmeal
1/2 cup margarine
1 cup brown sugar
1 cup sugar
2 eggs
1 1/2 cups flour
1 teaspoon cinnamon
1 teaspoon baking soda
1/2 teaspoon salt
1 teaspoon vanilla extract

Frosting:
1/2 cup butter or margarine
1 cup brown sugar, packed
1 tablespoon milk
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
1 cup coconut
1/2 cup chopped nuts
recipeText:
Pour boiling water over oatmeal and let stand for 20 minutes.  Cream sugar and margarine, beat in eggs, and sifted dry ingredients all at once.  Add vanilla and beat.  Add oatmeal and water and blend well.  Bake on greased cookie sheet at 350° for 20 minutes.
 
Frosting:  Boil frosting ingredients except coconut and nuts.  Blend in coconut and nuts and spread on cake while it is still hot.  Cool and Cut.

ingredientList:
1 cup corn syrup
1 cup sugar
1 cup peanut butter
6 cups crispy rice cereal
1 cup salted peanuts
1 10-ounce package M&M's
recipeText:
Grease a 9" x 13" pan with butter.

Combine syrup and sugar and peanut butter in a pan.  Heat until melted stirring constantly.  Remove from heat.

Add cereal, peanuts, and M&M's.  Pat into the pan.

ingredientList:
1/2 cup corn syrup
1/2 cup sugar
3/4 cup peanut butter
3 cups crispy rice cereal
1 package semisweet chocolate chips
1/2 package butterscotch chips
recipeText:
Combine syrup and sugar in a pan.  Heat until melted.  Don't boil!  Remove from heat.

Add peanut butter and mix thoroughly.  Fold in cereal and pat into a buttered pan.  Melt the chips and pour over top.

ingredientList:
1 cup brown sugar
1 cup oleo softened
1 1/2 cup flour
1/2 tsp soda
1 tsp salt
2 cups oatmeal

Mrs. Richards butterscotch carmel fudge
3/4 cup mini M&M
1/2 cup mini chocolate chips
1/2 cup almond bark
recipeText:
Mix well until crumbles. Put in jelly roll pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 10-15 minutes. While hot pour 1/2 pint jar of Mrs. Richards butterscotch carmel fudge topping over crust.

Sprinkle with 3/4 cup mini M&M and 1/2 cup mini chocolate chips. Melt 1/2 cup almond bark and drizzle on top.

ingredientList:
10 oz marshmallows
1/2 cup butter
1/4 cup creamy peanut butter
5 1/2 cups rice krispies

Toppings:
3/4 cup butterscotch chips
1 1/3 cup chocolate chips
recipeText:
Line a jelly roll pan or large cookie sheet with waxed paper. Lightly spray with cooking spray. 

In a microwave safe bowl, place the marshmallows, butter and peanut butter, microwave for 2 minutes. Stir, if not completely melted, return to microwave for another minute.

Stir rice krispies—coat well.

Press rice krispie mix onto wax paper, making an even layer.

Melt both chips in another microwave safe bowl and spread evenly on Rice krispies leaving an inch border along each side, not the ends.

Roll from wider edge, like a pinwheel. Refrigerate until cool. Cut and serve.

ingredientList:
1 cup sugar
1 cup light corn syrup
1 cup peanut butter
7 cups rice krispies

1 cup chocolate chips
1 cup butterscotch chips
recipeText: Combine sugar and syrup. Cook over moderate heat, stirring often until mixture boils. Remove from heat and stir in peanut butter.  Mix well. Add rice krispies and stir until well blended. Press mixture into buttered 9x13 inch pan. Melt chips together and spread evenly over bars. Cool until firm. Cut into bars.

ingredientList:
1/2 cup white sugar
1/2 cup white Karo
3/4 cup peanut butter 
1/2 tsp vanilla
3 cup special K cereal

Topping:
1 cup chocolate chips (milk chocolate)
1 cup butterscotch chips
recipeText:
Bring sugar and Karo to a boil. Remove from heat. Stir in peanut butter and vanilla. Add cereal. Mix well. Press into a greased 9x13 inch pan. Cool. 

Melt chocolate and butterscotch chips over low heat until smooth. Spread on bars.

ingredientList:
1 cup butter, softened
1 1/2 cups sugar
2 eggs
1 tsp grated lemon peel
3 1/4 cup all-purpose flour
3/4 cup slivered almonds, chopped
1 tsp baking powder
1/2 tsp salt
1 (12 oz) jar strawberry preserves
recipeText:
In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Beat in lemon peel. Combine 3 cups flour, almonds, baking powder and salt; gradually add to creamed mixture until mixture resembles coarse crumbs (do not over mix)

Set aside 1 cup of dough. Press the remaining dough into a greased 15x10x1 inch baking pan. Spread preserves to within ¼ inch of edges. Combine the reserved dough with the remaining flour; sprinkle over preserves. Bake at 350 degrees for 25-30 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool on wire rack. Cut into bars.

ingredientList:
1 1/4 cup flour
1 1/4 cup firmly packed light brown sugar, divided
3/4 cup (1 1/2 sticks) butter, softened
2 cups Post Selects Great Grains Crunchy Pecans Whole Grain Cereal
1 pkg (8 oz) cream cheese, softened
1 egg
3/4 cup strawberry Jam
recipeText:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix flour and 1 cup of the sugar in large bowl. Add butter; mix until crumbly. Stir in cereal.

Press about 3 cups of the cereal mixture firmly onto bottom of greased 13x9 inch baking pan. Mix cream cheese, remaining ¼ cup sugar and the egg in small bowl until blended; spread evenly over crust. Top with layers of jam and the remaining cereal mixture.

Bake 25-30 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool completely on wire rack. Cut into triangles or bars.

ingredientList:
2 lbs hamburger
salt and pepper to taste
1 little brown sugar
1/4 onion, chopped
1 can tomato soup
1 can cream of chicken soup (family sized)
1 pkg egg noodles
1 pkg cheddar cheese
recipeText:
Brown hamburger with salt and pepper, brown sugar and onion, add tomato soup. Cook noodles and drain, add cream of chicken soup.

Layer hamburger mixture and noodles mixture in casserole dish with cheese between layers.

Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes or a little longer.

recipeDescription: Mom's BBQ recipe with Tamara's changes
ingredientList:
1 cup onions
2 pounds ground beef
1 tablespoon mustard
1/2 cup water
1 teaspoon pepper
1 teaspoon chili powder
1 1/2 tablespoons vinegar
1 1/2 tablespoons sugar
1 bottle (small) ketchup
recipeText: Brown beef and drain grease.  Mix all ingredients together and simmer.

ingredientList:
1 lb hamburger
3/4 cup peppers
3/4 cup onions
1 1/2 cup corn
salt
cumin
garlic powder
chili powder
2 cups taco sauce
butter

tortillas
cheese

queso cheese
sour cream
lettuce
salsa
recipeText:
Brown and cook hamburger, onion, pepper, and corn. Add salt, cumin, garlic powder, chili powder and taco sauce. 

Put on tortillas, sprinkle with cheese.

Roll up tortillas, brush with melted butter. Bake at 350 degrees. 

Toppings:
queso cheese
sour cream
Lettuce
salsa

recipeDescription: Engel family favorite - note the seasoning messaging
ingredientList:
1 lb hamburger
1 onion
2 tsp oregano
2 tsp oregano
2 tsp salt
2 tsp paprika
2 tsp garlic powder
2 tsp cumin
2 tsp onion powder
1 tsp garlic salt
1 tsp cayenne
1/4 cup tomato paste
6 tortillas
olive oil
1 1/2 cups Colby Jack cheese

Special sour cream: sour cream, taco sauce, chipotle powder, paprika, lime juice
recipeText:
* I don't put in all of these seasoning in as it's too much. I put them in a back and only add a few teaspoons.

Brown and drain hamburger in large skillet. Add in onion and seasonings. Add tomato paste in and cook for a few minutes. Remove from the heat. 

Add tortillas to a large baking sheet. Brush a little olive oil onto each tortilla.

Add Colby Jack cheese to each tortilla, followed by hamburger mixture, them more cheese. Fold taco over. Top each taco with more Colby Jack cheese.

Baked on 375 for 15 minutes.

Serve with sour cream (special sour cream sauce: sour cream, taco sauce, chipotle powder, paprika, lime juice)

ingredientList:
4-6 bell peppers use any color – green, yellow, red, orange
1 tablespoon olive oil
1 lb ground beef - you can also use ground turkey, chicken, pork, sausage
1 medium onion chopped
1 jalapeno pepper chopped (optional, for spicy)
5 cloves garlic chopped
14.5 ounces fire roasted tomatoes (canned - or use diced tomatoes)
1 cup shredded cheese cheddar, mozzarella, or a blend
1 tablespoon paprika
1 teaspoon dried oregano
1 teaspoon dried basil
Salt and pepper to taste
1 cup cooked rice white, brown, or wild rice
For Garnish. Fresh chopped parsley, red pepper flakes
recipeText:
Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C) and bring a pot of water (enough to cover the bell peppers) to a boil.

2. Wash the bell peppers, cut off the tops, and scoop out the insides. If needed, slice a small part off the bottom of the peppers so they will stand upright. (NOTE: Chop the extra bell pepper tops to cook later with the onion - discard the stem.)

3. Blanch the bell peppers for 5 minutes to slightly soften. (Alternative, you can roast the peppers for 20 minutes to soften).

4. Set the softened peppers into a lightly oiled baking dish.

5. Heat the oil in a large pan to medium heat and add the onions, chopped pepper tops, and jalapeno (if using). Cook for 5 minutes to soften.

6. Add the garlic and cook 1 minute, or until the garlic becomes fragrant.

7. Add the ground beef and cook 5-6 minutes, breaking apart as you go, until cooked through.

8. Add the fire roasted tomatoes, seasonings, and cooked rice. Stir together and remove from heat.

9. Stir in half of the shredded cheese until incorporated.

ingredientList:
2 pounds lean ground beef 
1 cup chopped onions 
4 teaspoons chili powder 
2 tablespoons vegetable oil 
1 teaspoons salt 
2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce 
2 cups tomatoes 
2 cups corn bread batter (Use a Jiffy mix or your own favorite cornbread batter to top this hamburger pie recipe).
recipeText: In a large skillet, brown ground beef and onion in the oil; add seasoning and tomatoes. Cover and simmer over low heat for 15 minutes. Pour meat mixture into a greased 9x13 baking dish. Top with corn bread batter, spreading carefully over meat mixture with a wet knife. Bake at 425° for 20 minutes.

ingredientList:
1 pound ground beef                                             
1/2 cup onions                                                  
5 potatoes                                                      
4 carrots                                                                                                
1 can cream of mushroom soup                                    
1 cup water                                                     
1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce                   
1 can corn
recipeText:
Brown the beef and the onions.  Chop potatoes and carrots.  Mix all ingredients and place in a cake pan.
 
Bake at 350° for 30 - 40 minutes.

recipeDescription:
These are SO COOL!  Originally called porcupine,
they actually look like way more like hedgehogs.
ingredientList:
1 pound ground beef
1/2 cup uncooked long grain rice
1/2 cup water
1/3 cup chopped onions
1 teaspoon salt
1/4 teaspoon garlic powder
1/2 teaspoon pepper
1 15-ounce can tomato sauce
1 cup water
2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce
recipeText:
Combine first 7 ingredients; shape into 12 balls.

Place meatballs in an ungreased 9 x 13" baking dish.

Combine remaining 3 ingredients.  Pour over meatballs.

Cover with foil and bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour.

Uncover; bake 15 minutes longer.

ingredientList:
6 cups soft bread crumbs
1 1/2 cups milk
4 eggs
3 pounds ground beef (90% lean or better)
1 pound ground pork
2 finely chopped onions  or equivalent in minced onions
2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce
1 tablespoon salt
1/4 teaspoon pepper
1 cup ketchup
recipeText:
Soak bread in milk. (I sometimes don't use milk.  The grease from the meat makes it wet enough.)  

Add eggs and beat with rotary beater or mix by hand.  

Add meat, onion, Worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper, and 1/4 cup catsup.  Form into 4 loaves.  Place in loaf pan or 13x9x2 inch baking pan.  

Bake, uncovered at 350 degrees for 1 hour. 

Spread the rest of the catsup over top of loaves and bake extra 15 minutes.

recipeDescription: These can be used for pasta or with any meatball sauce.
ingredientList:
2 pounds ground beef
2 eggs, beaten
1 1/4 cups bread crumbs
1 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon garlic salt
1/2 teaspoon onion powder
1/2 teaspoon pepper
recipeText:
Place meatball ingredients in a large mixing bowl; mix well.  Shape into 1-1/4 inch balls.  Place on ungreased baking sheet.  

Bake at 450 degrees for 15 minutes.

Heat desired sauce and add meatballs.  Heat through.

ingredientList:
2 lbs hamburger
1 envelop Lipton Onion Soup
3/4 bread crumbs
2 eggs
3/4 cups water
1/3 cup ketchup
recipeText: Mix all ingredients and put in a loaf pan. Bake for 1 hour at 350 degrees. Let stand 10 minutes.

ingredientList:
1 lb ground beef
2 1/2 tsp. Dried oregano
2 1/2 tsp. Chili powder
1 pkg manicotti shells
2 1/2 cups water
1 16 oz jar picante sauce
1 cup Monterey jack cheese
sour cream
recipeText:
In bowl combine ground beef, chili powder, oregano. Spoon into noodles, arrange in greased backing pan. 

Combine water and picante sauce; pour over shells. Cover and refrigerate overnight. 

* Remove from fridge 30 min before baking. Cover and back at 350 degrees for 1 hour uncover. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake another 5-10 minutes until cheese in melted.

Top with sour cream as needed.

ingredientList:
2 lbs stew meat
2 can cream of mushroom
2 packet of brown gravy
2 envelope beefy onion soup mix
2 can of water


mashed potatoes
recipeText:
Mix together everything except potatoes in a 13x9 pan and cover with foil. Bake at 300 degrees for 3 hours. NO PEEKING!

Serve over mashed potatoes

ingredientList:
Seasoning
1 Tbsp chili powder
1/2 Tbsp paprika
1/2 tsp onion powder
1/4 tsp garlic powder
1/4 tsp cumin
1/8 tsp cayenne pepper
1 tsp sugar
1/2 tsp salt
1/2 Tbsp corn starch

Fajitas
2 small (or 1 lg) onion
2 medium green bell peppers
1 medium red bell pepper
1 lb chicken breast
2 Tbsp vegetable oil
1 medium lime
8 (6-inch) tortillas
1/2 cup sour cream
1/4 bunch cilantro
cheese
recipeText:
Preheat the oven to 400 degrees. Mix all of the ingredients for the fajita seasoning in a small bowl and set aside (chili powder, paprika, onion powder, garlic powder, cumin, cayenne pepper, sugar, salt, and corn starch.

Cut the onion and bell peppers into 1/4 to 1/2 wide strips. Place them in a large 9x13 inch casserole dish. Slice the chicken breast into very thin strips and add it to the casserole dish with the vegetables. 

Sprinkle the seasoning over the meat and vegetables. Drizzle the vegetable oil over everything and then use your hands to toss the ingredients until everything is well coated in oil and seasoning. Bake in the preheated oven for 35-40 minutes, stirring once half way through. Squeeze the juice from half of the lime over top of the meat and vegetables after it comes out of the oven.

Scoop a small amount of meat and vegetables into the center of each tortilla. Top with a few sprigs of cilantro, a dollop of sour cream, and an extra squeeze of lime if desired.

recipeName: Philly Cheesesteak with Peppers and Onions
ingredientList:
4 tablespoons vegetable oil (divided)
1  sweet yellow onion
1 red bell pepper
1 green bell pepper
3 pounds top sirloin or petite sirloin steak 
1 1/2 teaspoons Lawry's Seasoning Salt
1 teaspoon minced garlic
8 hoagie rolls 
6 tablespoons softened butter
7 ounces sliced provolone cheese
1 tablespoon Franks Hot Sauce
recipeText:
Before starting, place beef in the freezer for about 20 to 30 minutes. This will make it easier to slice.

Thinly slice the onion and peppers.  Add 2 tablespoons vegetable oil to a large, deep (14-inch) sauté pan and place over MEDIUM-LOW heat. Add onion and bell peppers. Allow to cook, stirring occasionally, until very tender. If they are beginning to brown, turn the heat down a bit. 

Use a sharp knife to trim excess fat from the steak and then slice it as thinly as possible across the grain. Chop the sliced steak into very small pieces; you want little ¼-inch pieces.  Season the meat with the Lawry's seasoning and minced garlic. 

In a separate skillet, add oil and place over MEDIUM-HIGH heat. Add half of the chopped steak and cook, stirring frequently, for about 4 to 5 minutes, or until no pink remains.

Transfer the first batch of steak with a slotted spoon to the skillet with fully cooked onions and peppers.  Do not transfer the juice!  Add additional oil, if needed, and repeat with remaining steak.

Place 7 provolone slices over the mixture in a circle and cover the pan. Cook on MEDIUM until cheese melts, about 4 to 5 minutes, then stir. 

Preheat oven to 400 degrees F.
Split open the hoagies rolls and place them on a baking sheet.  Butter the rolls.  Transfer the baking sheet to the oven and bake for 3 to 5 minutes or until lightly golden and toasted.

Use tongs to transfer meat mixture to the toasted sandwich rolls.

Garnish sandwich with Franks Hot Sauce. 

You can substitute cream cheese in place of the provolone cheese and add pickled jalapeno peppers for a Hot Popper Philly Cheesesteak Sandwich.

ingredientList:
1 lb hamburger
1 small onion
1 10oz pkg wide egg noodles, cooked and drained. Rinse with cold water in colander.
1 can mushrooms
1 jar (26 oz) spaghetti sauce
Italian seasoning
1 16 oz pkg of mozzarella cheese
recipeText:
Brown and drain hamburger and onions.
Cook and drain noodles; rinse in cold water
Mix the hamburger, noodles, mushrooms, spaghetti sauce and Italian seasoning together in cake pan.

Cover with cheese and bake covered for about 1 hour at 350 degrees.

ingredientList:
1 lb hamburger
1 package of saltine crackers
minute rice
1 pkg. of Lipton onion soup mix
Italian seasoning
2 eggs
1/2 cup milk
recipeText: Mix all ingredients. You want a consistency fairly moist. Roll into balls. Cook 20 minutes at 400 degrees. Check the middle of meat ball.

ingredientList:
1 pound hamburger
1 small onion
2 cans cream of chicken soup
1 can chili - NO beans
1 cup sour cream
soft shells
cheddar cheese

Sour cream for topping
recipeText:
Brown the hamburger and onion.
Mix soup, chili, and sour cream into cooked hamburger.  
Spread mixture on soft shells and sprinkle with cheese.
Bake for 350 degrees for 30 minutes.

ingredientList:
1 loaf bread dough
24 slices pepperoni
2 teaspoons minced garlic
1 teaspoon basil
1 pound Jimmy Dean Sausage, browned and drained
1/2 pound thin sliced cooked ham
4 cups shredded mozzarella cheese
1/4 cup Parmesan cheese (optional)
Vegetable oil
Oregano
recipeText:
Divide dough in half and roll one half into a 15 inch x 12 inch rectangle.  Spread half of rectangle with half of the garlic.  Over the garlic, sprinkle basil, then lay twelve slices of pepperoni, half of the sausage, ham and cheese.  Fold plain half of the dough over the filling and seal ends well.  Brush with oil and sprinkle with oregano.  Repeat with second half of dough.
 
Bake at 400° for 25-30 minutes until lightly browned.  Cool and cut into 1 inch slices. 

Alternative: use roast beef slices and swiss cheese.

ingredientList:
4-6 bell peppers use any color – green, yellow, red, orange
1 tablespoon olive oil
1 lb hamburger - you can also use ground turkey or chicken
1 medium onion chopped
1 jalapeno pepper chopped (optional, for spicy)
5 cloves garlic chopped
14.5 ounces fire roasted tomatoes (canned - or use diced tomatoes)
1 cup shredded cheese cheddar, mozzarella, or a blend
1 tablespoon paprika
1 teaspoon dried oregano
1 teaspoon dried basil
Salt and pepper to taste
1 cup cooked rice white, brown, or wild rice
For Garnish. Fresh chopped parsley, red pepper flakes
recipeText:
Preheat your oven to 425°F and bring a pot of water (enough to cover the bell peppers) to a boil.

Wash the bell peppers, cut off the tops, and scoop out the insides. If needed, slice a small part off the bottom of the peppers so they will stand upright. (NOTE: Chop the extra bell pepper tops to cook later with the onion - discard the stem.)

Blanch the bell peppers for 5 minutes to slightly soften. (Alternative, you can roast the peppers for 20 minutes to soften).

Set the softened peppers into a lightly oiled baking dish.

Heat the oil in a large pan to medium heat and add the onions, chopped pepper tops, and jalapeno (if using). Cook for 5 minutes to soften.

Add the garlic and cook 1 minute, or until the garlic becomes fragrant.

Add the ground beef and cook 5-6 minutes, breaking apart as you go, until cooked through.

Add the fire roasted tomatoes, seasonings, and cooked rice. Stir together and remove from heat.

Stir in half of the shredded cheese until incorporated.

ingredientList:
2 pounds ground beef
8 ounces pork sausages (Jimmy Dean's Hot Sausage)
2 cups bread crumbs
1 1/2 eggs
1 1/2 cups milk
6 tablespoons minced onions
3/8 teaspoon ginger
3/8 teaspoon nutmeg
3/8 teaspoon pepper
1 tablespoon salt
recipeText: Mix all ingredients together and cook in frying pan.

recipeDescription:
Tamara's Rad-dish recipe.
Coat bite-sized meatballs in savory gravy for a classic Swedish dish.
ingredientList:
FOR MEATBALLS:
1 pound ground beef
1 pound ground pork
1 cup bread crumbs
2 eggs
1/2 cup milk
1 teaspoon onion powder
1/2 teaspoon allspice
2 teaspoons salt

FOR GRAVY:
6 tablespoons flour
3 cups beef broth
1/2 cup heavy cream
6 tablespoons butter
1/2 teaspoon salt
recipeText:
Preheat oven to 450 degrees.
 
Line baking sheet with aluminum foil.  Grease with cooking spray.

Mix all meatball ingredients in a bowl.  Shape into 1-inch mini meatballs.  Set on baking sheet.
Bake meatballs for 12 - 15 minutes until cooked through.


Gravy:
Melt butter in skillet over medium-high heat.   Add flour, cook 3 minutes, whisking continuously until golden brown.
Add beef broth and 1/2 teaspoon salt.  Bring to boil and cook until thickened, whisking occasionally (about 3 minutes).
Turn off heat.  Stir in cream.  Add meatballs to gravy and serve.

ingredientList:
2 pounds hamburger
2 onions, chopped
3/4 cup water
2 envelopes taco seasoning
15 ounces tomato sauce
1 pound macaroni, uncooked
2 green chilies, diced

cheddar cheese, shredded
sour cream
recipeText:
Brown and drain hamburger and onions.
Cook and drain macaroni.
Combine all ingredients including hamburger and macaroni. 

Top with cheese and sour cream as desired.

ingredientList:
1 hamburger
onion
Sour cream
1 packet taco seasoning
Cheddar cheese

Doritos (crushed)
black olives
tomatoes
lettuce
taco sauce
recipeText:
Brown and drain hamburger and onion. Once cooked combine sour cream, taco seasoning, and cheddar cheese.

Put in a 9x9 baking dish and bake at 375 degrees.

Top with Doritos (crushed), black olives, tomatoes, lettuce, and taco sauce

ingredientList:
1 pkg crescent rolls
1 1/2 lb hamburger
1 pkg taco seasoning
1 cup sour cream
2 cups shredded cheese
chopped onion
shredded lettuce
chopped tomato
taco sauce
recipeText:
Place rolls in bottom of 8x8 pan. Brown and drain hamburger. Mix seasoning and sour cream. Sprinkle on cheese. 

Bake at 350 degrees for 13-15 minutes. 

Mix onion, lettuce, tomato. Place on top. Pour taco sauce over.

ingredientList:
1/2 cup onions
1 pound ground beef
Dash salt
Dash pepper
1 can cream of mushroom soup  (or cream of celery soup)
16 ounces frozen tater tots
1 cup shredded cheddar cheese
recipeText:
Grease a 9" x 13" baking dish.  Brown onions, and beef.  Drain off grease.  

Spread mixture into the baking dish and sprinkle with salt and pepper.  

Pour can of soup over the mixture (an additional can is optional and makes the meal more juicy).  Top with frozen tater tots.

Bake at 400 degrees for 45 minutes, when mixture is bubbly.  Sprinkle with cheddar cheese and bake until cheese is melted.

ingredientList:
2 cups long grain wild rice
Mrs. Dash  table seasoning
2 heaping teaspoons - soup beef based bullion
1 medium onion
1 pound hamburger
4 cans cream of mushroom soup
recipeText:
Cook rice according to package. While cooking rice add seasoning salt and beef bullion. Brown hamburger and onion. Mix all together along with cream of mushroom soup. 

Bake at 350 degrees until warm.

ingredientList:
2 cups dry long grain wild rice
Mrs. Dash table seasoning salt
2 heaping teaspoon of soup based bullion
2 pounds hamburger
1 medium onion
4 cans cream of mushroom soup

Optional: Cheddar cheese
recipeText:
Cook rice as directed, but add the seasoning salt and bullion (typically takes about 45 minutes). Brown hamburger and onion. Mix together the rice, hamburger mixtures and cream of mushroom soup. 

Bake at 350 degrees until warm.
Add cheese if desired

ingredientList:
2 cups frozen strawberries (without sugar)
2 cups milk
2 tablespoons sugar
1/4 cup grenadine syrup
1 cup cold club soda
recipeText: Combine all except soda in a blender.  Pour into glasses.  Add soda to glasses and serve.

recipeDescription: Engel family favorite. From Lori Heymann recipe.
ingredientList:
1 lg can peaches
46 oz can pineapple juice
12 oz can frozen lemonade
12 oz can frozen orange juice
5 bananas
2 ½ cup water
recipeText:
Blend peaches (including the juice) and bananas until smooth. 

Put into ice cream pail and add the juices, lemonade and water. Mix well and freeze. 

When serving add 7UP or soda of your choice and if desired, rum, brandy, or vodka.

ingredientList:
1 can Hawaiian Punch
1 can Dole Pineapple Juice
1 2-liter bottle 7-UP
recipeText: Mix together and chill.

ingredientList:
1 3/4 cups raisin bran cereal 
1 1/4 cups all-purpose flour 
3/4 cup sugar 
1 1/4 teaspoons baking soda 
1 teaspoon ground cinnamon 
1/4 teaspoon salt 
1 egg 
3/4 cup buttermilk 
1/4 cup canola oil 
3/4 cup finely chopped peeled tart apple 
3/4 cup grated carrots 
1/4 cup chopped walnuts
recipeText:
In a bowl, combine the first six ingredients. In a small bowl, beat the egg, buttermilk and oil. Stir into dry ingredients just until moistened. Fold in apple, carrots and walnuts. Fill paper-lined muffin cups or cups coated with nonstick cooking spray three-fourths full. 
Bake at 400 degrees F for 20-23 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean. 

Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pan to a wire rack. Serve warm.

ingredientList:
3 bananas
1 cup sugar
2 cups flour
1 teaspoon baking powder
1 teaspoon salt
2 eggs
1 teaspoon baking soda
1/2 cup shortening
1/2 cup walnuts
recipeText:
Mash bananas and mix with sugar.  Let stand 15 minutes.  Add the rest of the ingredients (except walnuts) and beat thoroughly.  Mix in walnuts.  
 
Bake in greased bread pan at 325° for 50 - 60 minutes, or in cupcake tins for 20 minutes.

ingredientList:
3 - 3 1/2 cups flour                                            
1 package Fletschmans Rapid Yeast                               
1 cup very warm water (125 to 130 degrees)                      
2 tablespoons oils                                              
3/4 teaspoon salt
recipeText: Mix 2 cups flour, yeast, salt, and oil.  Stir in the water.  Stir in more flour, enough to make the dough soft.  Knead the dough for 4 - 6 minutes on a floured board.  Divide to make balls.  Makes two 12-inch pizzas.

ingredientList:
2 c. flour
2 tsp baking powder
4 T. butter
1/2 tsp salt
3/4  +/- milk
recipeText:
Mix flour, baking powder and salt. Cut in butter and add milk gradually until dough.

Turn out on floured board, kneed for 30 seconds. Shape. Bake at 425 degrees for 12-15 minutes.

recipeDescription: Use this recipe to make a 2 cup Bisquick substitute.
ingredientList:
2 cups flour
3 Tbsp. baking powder
1 Tbsp. salt
1/3 cup butter
recipeText: Chop butter in food processor. Mix all ingredients.

ingredientList:
1 1/2 cups sugar
3/4 cup margarine
3 eggs, beaten
3 large bananas (1 cup mashed)
3 cups flour
1 1/2 teaspoons baking soda
10 ounces maraschino cherries
1/4 cup cherry juice
1/4 cup walnuts
6 ounces semisweet chocolate chips
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients (except cherries) together, slowly mix in cherries, pour mixture into 2 bread loaf pans.  Bake at 350° for 45 minutes.
 
For a healthier twist:  
Use 3/4 cup apple sauce instead of margarine.
Use 2 1/2 cups flour and 1/2 cup oats instead of 3 cups of flour.

recipeName: Cinnamon Bread Pudding with Butter Sauce
ingredientList:
6 eggs
1 3/4 cups half and half or light cream
2 teaspoons vanilla extract
2 cups milk
1 cup sugar
6 cups cubed cinnamon bread or rolls

Butter Sauce:
1/2 cup brown sugar
1/4 cup butter
1/3 cup light corn syrup
1/4 cup half and half or light cream
recipeText:
Beat eggs, milk, 1 3/4 cups cream, 1 cup sugar, and vanilla until combined.  Stir in cinnamon bread.  Grease a 2-quart baking dish.  Add bread pudding mixture, spreading evenly.  
 
Bake at 325° for 55 - 60 minutes until the top is puffed and a knife inserted comes out clean.

Butter Sauce: In a small saucepan, heat brown sugar and 1/4 cup butter.  Carefully add 1/3 cup light corn syrup and 1/4 cup cream.  Cook 1 to 2 minutes until sugar is dissolved and mixture is smooth.  Serve over warm pudding.

ingredientList:
2 cups cubed bread
1 teaspoon minced garlic
1 teaspoon oregano
1 teaspoon Italian seasoning
1/2 cup melted butter
recipeText:
Melt butter. Add seasoning and stir in bread.  Place on flat cookie sheet.  

Bake at 400 degrees for 5 - 8 minutes.

ingredientList:
2 tablespoons soft butter
3/4 cup sugar
2 eggs, beaten
1 cup milk
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
3 cups flour
3 tablespoons baking powder
1/4 teaspoon salt
1/4 teaspoon nutmeg
recipeText:
Combine the butter, sugar, and eggs.  Then add in milk and vanilla.  Lastly, mix in the remaining ingredients.
 
Deep fat fry at 375° to 400°.

ingredientList:
1 loaf frozen white bread dough
1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil
1/2 tablespoon dried basil
1/2 tablespoon dried minced onion
1/2 tablespoon oregano
1 8-ounce package pepperoni
1 6-ounce package shredded mozzarella cheese
1 egg, lightly beaten
recipeText:
Allow frozen bread dough to thaw approximately 8 hours, or overnight, in the refrigerator. 

Place dough in a large, lightly greased bowl. Place bowl in a warm location, and allow dough to rise until doubled (2 to 3 hours). 

Punch down dough. 


On a lightly greased, large baking sheet, roll dough into an approximately 12x18 inch rectangle.   

Brush dough lightly with olive oil. Sprinkle with basil, onion flakes and oregano. Layer with pepperoni to within a half inch of the edges. Top with mozzarella cheese. 

Beginning with the longest edge, roll dough into a thin cylinder and seal seam. Glaze with egg. 

Preheat oven to 350 degrees.  Bake in the preheated oven 35 minutes, or until golden brown. Cut into bite sized pieces to serve. 

Use Timpone's Organic Traditional Spaghetti Sauce as dipping sauce.

ingredientList:
1 loaf frozen white bread dough
8 ounces softened cream cheese
Italian seasoning
Mozzarella cheese
Pepper jack cheese
Bacon bits
Sliced jalapeno pepper
recipeText:
Thaw bread dough in refrigerator.  
Remove from fridge and let rise on the counter.  

Roll out and cut to the size of desired pizza roll size.  

Spread cream cheese on dough, sprinkle with Italian seasoning. 

Lay on slices of pepper jack cheese, sprinkle on bacon bits, cover with mozzarella cheese. 

Bake at 400 degrees for 14 to 18 minutes or until edges are slightly brown.

ingredientList:
4 cups mashed potatoes                              
1/2 cup shortening                              
1/2 cup cream                              
1 tablespoon sugar
1 teaspoon salt (or slightly more)
3 cups flour
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients except flour.  Let it sit overnight.
Cool thoroughly.  Then add the flour.  Roll out dough and fry at 450° to 500°.

ingredientList:
4 pkgs Pillsbury buttermilk biscuits (10 in pkg), cut in quarters

Roll in sugar and cinnamon. Arrange in greased bundt pan or in 2 bread pans.

Mix together: 
1/2 cup brown sugar
1/2 cup white sugar
2/3 cup buttermilk
recipeText:
Bring to boil. Pour over dough. 

Bake at 350 degrees oven for 25 minutes in break pan or for 40-45 minutes in bundt pan.

ingredientList:
1 loaf frozen bread dough, thawed
salt
oil
recipeText:
Roll bits of dough into finger size rolls.  

Place on pan, cover, and let them rise for about a 1/2 hour.

Put a little oil (2-3 tablespoons), salt, and water (2-3 tablespoons) in a frying pan.  

Fry on medium-high for 2-3 minutes.  Do not open the lid!  Then turn to low and continue frying until most of the steam escapes. 

Take cover off.  Bottom of noodla should be brown.  Turn noodla over and fry until brown.  

Take from pan, salt, and serve immediately.

ingredientList:
1/4 cup butter, melted
1 tablespoon dried parsley flakes
1 teaspoon garlic powder
1/4 teaspoon garlic salt
1 loaf frozen white bread dough, thawed
recipeText:
In a small bowl, combine the butter, parsley, garlic powder and garlic salt. 

Cut dough into 1-in. pieces; dip into butter mixture. 

Layer in a greased 9x5-in. loaf pan. 

Cover and let rise until doubled, about 1 hour.

Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes or until golden brown.

ingredientList:
1 1/2 cups sugar
1 cup buttermilk
2/3 cup vegetable oil
2 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
1 egg, beaten
1 teaspoon baking soda
1 teaspoon cinnamon
1 teaspoon salt
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
1 1/2 cups diced rhubarb
1/2 cup chopped walnuts

TOPPING:
1/4 cup packed brown sugar
1/4 cup chopped nuts
1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon
recipeText:
In a medium mixing bowl, combine all ingredients except rhubarb, nuts, and topping ingredients. Gently stir in rhubarb and nuts.  Spoon the batter into 24 greased muffin cups. Combine topping ingredients and sprinkle over tops of muffins. 
 
Bake at 350° for 20 minutes or until muffins test done.

recipeDescription: Ken made for Melissa for their first(?) anniversary.
ingredientList:
1 loaf bread dough
24 slices pepperoni
2 teaspoons minced garlic
1 teaspoon basil
1 pound Jimmy Dean Sausage, browned and drained
1/2 pound thin sliced cooked ham
4 cups shredded mozzarella cheese
1/4 cup Parmesan cheese (optional)
Vegetable oil
Oregano
recipeText:
Divide dough in half and roll one half into a 15 inch x 12 inch rectangle.  

Spread half of rectangle with half of the garlic.  

Over the garlic, sprinkle basil, then lay twelve slices of pepperoni, half of the sausage, ham and cheese.  

Fold plain half of the dough over the filling and seal ends well.  

Brush with oil and sprinkle with oregano.  Repeat with second half of dough.

Bake at 400 degrees for 25-30 minutes until lightly browned.  Cool and cut into 1 inch slices. 

Alternative: use roast beef slices and swiss cheese.

ingredientList:
1 package yellow (lemon) cake mix
1 package (3 1/2 ounce) instant vanilla pudding
3/4 cup oil
3/4 cup water
4 eggs
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
1 teaspoon butter extract
1/2 cup sugar
2 teaspoons cinnamon
recipeText:
Mix the cake mix, pudding, oil, water, eggs, vanilla and butter extracts for 8 minutes on high speed.

Mix sugar and cinnamon.

Grease 2 loaf pans.  Pour 1/4 of the batter in each.  

Alternate between cinnamon mixture and the batter.

Bake at 350° for 40 minutes.

ingredientList:
20 oz bag frozen, shredded has browns
8 slices thick-cut, cooked, and coarsely chopped
8 oz shredded cheddar cheese
6 green onions, sliced thin
12 eggs
1/2 cup milk
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon pepper

Optional toppings: Fresh salsa, hot sauce
recipeText:
Layer half of the hash browns into the bottom and top with half the bacon, half the cheese, and one-third of the green onions. Set aside some bacon and green onion for garnish and then repeat with a second layer of hash brown, bacon, cheese, and onion.

In a large bowl;, whisk together eggs, milk, salt, and pepper and slowly pour over top. Cook until eggs are set, approximately 2-3 hours on high, or 4-5 hours on low. Sprinkle remaining bacon and onions on top and serve immediately, with or without hot sauce.

ingredientList:
3 large eggs
1/2 cup milk
1/2 cup water
3 tablespoons butter, melted
3/4 cup flour
1/2 teaspoon salt
8 ounces cream cheese, softened
1 1/4 cups powdered sugar
1 tablespoon lemon juice
1 teaspoon lemon zest
1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
1 cup heavy cream, whipped
4 cups sliced strawberries
recipeText:
Step 1:
Place the eggs, milk, water, melted butter, flour, and salt in the pitcher of a blender; blend until smooth.

Step 2:
Blend the cream cheese, confectioners' sugar, lemon juice, lemon zest, and vanilla with an electric mixer until smooth. Gently fold in the whipped cream.

Step 3:
Heat a lightly oiled griddle or non-stick skillet over medium heat. Pour or scoop the batter onto the griddle, using approximately 2 tablespoons for each crepe. 
Tip and rotate pan to spread batter as thinly as possible. Flip over when the batter is set and the edges are beginning to brown. 
Cook until the other side begins to brown. Stack finished crepes on a plate, cover with a damp towel and set aside.

Step 4:
To serve, fill each crepe with 1/4 cup sliced strawberries and 1/3 cup of the cream cheese filling, roll up and top with a small dollop of the cream cheese filling and more sliced strawberries.

ingredientList:
12 eggs
1/2 green pepper
1 onion, diced
2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese
1 pound frozen shredded hash brown potatoes
1 cup cooked ham
1 pound Jimmy Dean Sausage
Dash salt
Dash pepper
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients together, pour into 9"x13" pan.

Bake at 350 degrees for 35 to 45 minutes.

recipeDescription: The best apple cake ever according to Dylan Sellers.
ingredientList:
3 cups all-purpose flour
1 tablespoon baking powder
2 cups plus 5 tablespoons sugar, divided
1 cup vegetable oil
4 eggs
1/3 cup orange juice
1/2 teaspoon salt
2-1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract
4 medium tart apples, peeled and thinly sliced
2 teaspoons ground cinnamon (I add extra for better flavor)
Confectioners' sugar, optional
recipeText:
In a mixing bowl, combine flour, baking powder, 2 cups sugar, oil, eggs, orange juice, salt and vanilla. 
Beat until thoroughly combined. 

In another bowl, toss apples with cinnamon and 5 tablespoons of sugar.  

Spread one-third of batter in a greased, floured 10-in. tube pan. 

Cover with half of the apples. Repeat layers. 

Spoon remaining batter over top. Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour and 30 minutes or until cake tests done. 

Cool in pan for 20 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely. 

Just before serving, dust with confectioners' sugar if desired.

ingredientList:
2 eggs
3 tablespoons sugar
1 cup milk
1 1/2 tablespoons shortening
1 pinch salt
3 cups flour
1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder
Apple slices
1/2 cup sugar and cinnamon mixture
recipeText:
Mix eggs, sugar, milk, shortening, and salt together.  When well mixed, add flour & baking powder.  

Press into a greased, floured 9x13 inch cake pan.  

Place apple slices in rows, sprinkle with cinnamon and sugar.  

Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes.

ingredientList:
3 bananas
1 cup sugar
2 cups flour
1 teaspoon baking powder
1 teaspoon salt
2 eggs
1 teaspoon baking soda
1/2 cup shortening
1/2 cup walnuts
3/4 teaspoon cinnamon (optional)
recipeText:
Mash bananas and mix with sugar.  Let stand 15 minutes.  Add the rest of the ingredients (except walnuts) and beat thoroughly.  Mix in walnuts.  

Bake in greased bread pan at 325 degrees for 50 - 60 minutes, or in cupcake tins for 16 - 18 minutes.

ingredientList:
1 pkg (2 layer size) yellow cake mix
3 eggs
1 cup mashed ripe bananas (about 3)
1 cup sour cream
1/4 cup oil
1 pkg (8 oz) cream cream cheese, softened
1/2 cup butter, softened
1 pkg (16 oz) powdered sugar (about 4 cups)
1 cup planters walnut pieces, finely chopped
recipeText:
Heat oven to 350 degrees. Beat cake mix, eggs, bananas, sour cream and oil with mixer on low until moistened, scraping bottom of bowl often. Beat on medium 2 minutes

Pour into greased and floured 13x9 inch pan. Bake 35 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool cake completely in pan on wire rack.

Beat cream cheese and butter with mixer on medium until blended. Gradually add sugar, beating well after each addition.

Remove cake from pan. Carefully cut cake crosswise in half using serrated knife.

Place cake half, top-side down, on plate; spread top with frosting. Top with remaining cake half, top-side up. Frost top and sides

Press nuts onto sides. Refrigerate leftovers. Sprinkle top with additional chopped nuts.

ingredientList:
2 cups flour
2 cups sugar
1 teaspoon baking powder
1 teaspoon baking soda
1 teaspoon cinnamon
3 cups finely shredded carrots
1 cup vegetable oil
4 eggs
1 recipe for Butter Frosting
recipeText:
Grease and lightly flour 13x9x2-inch baking pan.

In a large mixing bowl, combine flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and cinnamon.  Add carrots, oil, and eggs.  Beat with an electric mixer until combined.  Pour batter into the prepared pans.

Bake at 350 degrees for 35 to 40 minutes or until a wooden toothpick comes out clean.

Cool cake in the pan on a wire rack until completely cooled.  Frost.  

Cover and store in the refrigerator.

ingredientList:
2 cups sugar
2 teaspoons baking soda
2 cups flour
2 teaspoons cinnamon
1/2 teaspoon salt
1 1/2 cups oils
4 eggs
3 cups shredded carrots
3/4 cup nuts and raisins
4 ounces cream cheese
2 1/4 cups powdered sugar
2 teaspoons soft butter
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
Pinch salt
recipeText:
Cake:  Mix ingredients from the sugar to the nuts and raisins.  Pour into a greased 9" x 13" cake pan.  Bake at 350° for 40 - 45 minutes.  
 
Frosting:  mix cream cheese, powdered sugar, butter, vanilla, and a pinch of salt. Frost the cake.

ingredientList:
8 oz cream cheesecake
1/3 cup sugar
2 tsp vanilla
1 cup sour cream
8 oz cool whip
recipeText:
Mix cream cheese until smooth. 
Add sugar. 
Stir in vanilla and sour cream. 
Add cool whip
Let set 4 hours.

ingredientList:
1 1/2 cups sugar
3/4 cup margarine
3 eggs, beaten
3 large bananas (1 cup mashed)
3 cups flour
1 1/2 teaspoons baking soda
10 ounces maraschino cherries
1/4 cup cherry juice
1/4 cup walnuts
6 ounces semisweet chocolate chips
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients (except cherries) together, slowly mix in cherries, pour mixture into 2 bread loaf pans.  

Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes, or in cupcake tins for 20-25 minutes.

For a healthier twist:  
Use 3/4 cup apple sauce instead of margarine.
Use 2 1/2 cups flour and 1/2 cup oats instead of 3 cups of flour.

ingredientList:
1 box chocolate cake mix, or a fully cooked chocolate cake
1 box chocolate pudding
1 container of cool whip
recipeText:
Make the chocolate cake and allow to cool completely.

Make the chocolate pudding and refrigerate until completely cool.

Mix chocolate pudding with the cool whip.

Add a dollop of pudding frosting to each cake slice or frost cake with frosting and serve immediately. 

Refrigerate leftover frosting or any cake that has been frosted.

ingredientList:
1 pkg white cake mix
1 pkg (3 oz) strawberry gelatin powder
1 cup vegetable oil
1/4 cup water
4 eggs, lightly beaten
3/4 cup mashed strawberries, fresh or frozen

Ingredients for strawberry icing

1/2 cup butter
1 (16 oz) box confectioners' sugar
1/4 cup mashed strawberries
recipeText:
Combine cake mix and gelatin powder in a large bowl. Beat in oil eggs, water, and strawberries. Pour into 2 9-inch round greased and floured cake pans. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 30 minutes, until a toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool and frost with strawberry icing.

Icing:
Mix butter and confectioners' sugar together until smooth. Add berries. Spread between cake layers, then frost top and sides

ingredientList:
1 box white or flavored cake mix
1 pkg jello (any flavor)
Cool Whip
recipeText:
1 box white or flavored cake mix – mix and bake according to directions
Cool; Poke holes in cake with toothpick

Dissolve 1 pkg of jello in ½ c boiling water and add 1 cup cold water.
Pour over cake
Top with Cool whip

ingredientList:
1 pkg lemon cake mix
1 box lemon jello
4 eggs
3/4 cup water

Glaze
2 lemons
2 cups powered sugar
recipeText:
Blend and beat 3 minutes
Add ¾ cup oil and beat 1 minute more
Bake in 9x13 inch cake pan at 325 degrees for 45-50 minutes


Glaze:
Juice and rind of 2 lemons and 2 cups powered sugar. While cake is still hot prick with a fork both ways about 1 inch apart and glaze at once. Be careful not to under bake as it tends to fall.

ingredientList:
1 pkg yellow cake mix
3/4 cup oil
3 eggs
1 sm can mandarin oranges with juice

Frosting: (Store in refrigerator)
8 oz cool whip
1 sm pkg vanilla instant pudding mix
1 medium can crushed pineapple with juice
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients until well blended. Pour into greased 9x13 inch cake pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 35 minutes. Store in refrigerator.

Frosting: mix together and spread on cake

ingredientList:
1/2 cup unsalted butter, at room temperature
3/4 cup white sugar
2 eggs
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
1/2 cup milk
1/2 cup full fat sour cream
2 cups all purpose flour
2 teaspoons baking powder
1/4 teaspoon salt
1 tablespoon unsalted butter (for greasing the cake pan)
3-4 fresh peaches (or about 3 cups canned peach slices), sliced or chopped

For the streusel topping:
2/3 cup all purpose flour
2/3 cup brown or white sugar
4 tablespoons melted butter
1/2 teaspoon cinnamon
recipeText:
Preheat your oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit.

Wash 3-4 large peaches and chop them into bite sized pieces or slices (you'll need about 2 and a half cups of chopped or thinly sliced peaches to cover the cake.). Set them aside in a bowl while you prepare the cake batter.

Add the butter and the sugar to the bowl of your stand mixer and beat them together until the mixture is fluffy and becomes a pale colour (about 4-5 minutes). It's important that the butter is at room temperature before you begin. This will allow it to integrate properly with the other wet ingredients.
Feel free to use a hand mixer if you prefer.

Add the eggs and the vanilla and beat them in on medium speed until the mixture is smooth. It's a good idea to scrape down the bowl periodically to make sure everything is incorporated evenly.

Add the milk and sour cream and beat in these ingredients on low speed until they're combined.

To a separate bowl add the flour, the baking powder and the salt and mix these ingredients together with a fork or a wire whisk. Once they're all incorporated, dump the flour mixture into the bowl of the stand mixer with the wet ingredients. Turn the mixer on low and watch the batter come together. As soon as you see the batter form with streaks of flour throughout, turn off the mixer and remove the bowl.

Over-mixing at this stage can cause an overly dense and dry cake with large air bubbles, which you definitely don't want. Using a rubber spatula, scrape down the sides of the bowl by hand and gently fold in the remaining flour. Be sure to stop folding as soon as everything is combined.

Grease a 9x13 rectangular glass cake pan (or a metal pan) with some butter and pour the batter into the pan, using the spatula to push the batter into the corners and even out the surface. Don't worry, the batter will seem thick but it's supposed to be like that.

Spread the peaches over the top of the batter.

In a clean bowl mix together the flour, sugar and cinnamon for the streusel topping. Add in the melted butter and mix everything together with a fork until the mixture becomes crumbly.

Sprinkle the streusel mixture over the cake and the peaches, making sure to spread it at evenly as possible and into all the corners.

Bake the cake at 350 degrees Fahrenheit for 47-50 minutes. When it's finished baking the topping will be slightly browned on top, the fruit will be bubbly, and when you insert a toothpick into the center of the cake it will come out clean.

Let the cake cool for at least 25 minutes before slicing.

ingredientList:
2 cups graham cracker crumbs
6 tablespoons butter, melted
1 cup sugar, divided
4 pkg (8 oz each) cream cheese, softened
1 pkg jell-o peach flavor gelatin
1 can sliced peaches in juice, drained, chopped
1 tub (8 oz) cool whip, thawed
recipeText:
Mix graham crumbs, butter and ¼ cup sugar; press onto bottom of 13x9 inch pan. Refrigerate while preparing filling

Beat cream cheese and remaining sugar in large bowl with mixer until blended. Add dry gelatin mix; mix well. Stir in peaches and cool whip. Spoon over crust; cover

Refrigerate 4 hours or until firm. Refrigerate leftovers
Substitute: prepare using 2 chopped fresh peaches.

ingredientList:
2 tablespoons butter or margarine
1/3 cup packed brown sugar
1 tablespoon water
1 8-ounce can pineapple slices, drained and halved
4 maraschino cherries, halved
1 1/3 cups flour
2/3 cup sugar
2 teaspoons baking powder
2/3 cup milk
1/4 cup butter or margarine
1 egg
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
recipeText:
In a saucepan, melt 2 tablespoons butter, add brown sugar and water, stir until dissolved.  Remove from heat.  

Pour mixture into bottom of cake pan.  

Place pineapple slices on top of sugar mixture.  Fill center of each pineapple with a cherry.   

In a mixing bowl, combine the remaining ingredients.  Beat 2 minutes.  Pour batter over pineapple, being careful not to disturb the fruit.  

Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes.  Let stand 5 minutes.  Loosen edges and invert cake onto a platter.

recipeName: Pound cake with lemon glaze and lemon whipped cream
ingredientList:
pound cake
1 cup cold heavy cream
1 tablespoon sugar
1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice
2 teaspoons finely grated lemon zest
2 lemons, zested and juiced
1/4 cup sugar
recipeText: Whipped together sugar, and whipping cream until peaks form. Then stir in the lemon zest and chill. In a sauce pan, juice the lemons, add sugar and bring to a boil stirring constantly. Top pound cake with the glaze and then with whipped cream. Or put it on ice cream.

recipeDescription: Fluffy muffins with raspberries and chocolate chips.
ingredientList:
1 egg
2 1/3 cups flour
1 teaspoon baking soda
2 teaspoons baking powder
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/2 cup vegetable oil
1 cup plain yogurt
3/4 cup sugar
1 cup fresh or frozen raspberries
1/2 cup chocolate chips
recipeText:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees.
Line muffin tins with paper liners.

Whisk egg until smooth.  Add oil, yogurt, and sugar to egg mixture.  Mix until combined. 
Add in flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt.  Stir until just combined.  Do not overmix.
Add raspberries and chocolate chips.  Gently stir into batter.

Scoop into muffin tins.
Bake 20 - 24 minutes until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.

ingredientList:
2 cup cake flour
2 cup sugar
2 tsp baking powder
1 cup boiling water
5 eggs whites
2 tsp cream of tartar
1 tsp vanilla or almond extract
1/2 tsp salt

Filling:
2 cup raspberries
1 cup sugar
1 cup water
1/4 cup cornstarch
recipeText:
Sift flour sugar and baking powder; add boiling water. Mix together and let stand overnight. Beat egg whites, cream of tartar and salt until it stands in point. Then fold in the rest. Put into 9x13 inch ungreased pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 25 minutes. Tip over like angel food cake to cool.

Filling:
Cook berries until soft in sauce pot. Strain off the juices to get ride of seeds. Add water to juice. Mix a little water in cornstarch. Add slowly to hot liquid to thicken. Cool completely. Split the cake into 2 layers. Return 1 layer to clean pan; spread ½ the filling over it put on the second layer. Add remaining filling and top with whipped cream. Refrigerate overnight.

ingredientList:
1 1/2 cups sugar
1 cup buttermilk (1 cup milk, 1 tbsp lemon juice)
2/3 cup vegetable oil
2 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
1 egg, beaten
1 teaspoon baking soda
1 teaspoon cinnamon
1 teaspoon salt
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
1 1/2 cups diced rhubarb
1/2 cup chopped walnuts

TOPPING:
1/4 cup packed brown sugar
1/4 cup chopped nuts
1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon
recipeText:
In a medium mixing bowl, combine all ingredients except rhubarb, nuts, and topping ingredients. 

Gently stir in rhubarb and nuts.  

Spoon the batter into 24 greased muffin cups. 

Combine topping ingredients and sprinkle over tops of muffins. 

Bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes or until muffins test done.

ingredientList:
1 yellow cake mix
4 eggs
1/2 cup oil
11 oz mandarin oranges (do not drain)

Topping:
1-3 oz box instant vanilla pudding
16 oz crushed pineapple (do not drain)
recipeText:
Mix on medium for 2-3 minutes. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes

Topping:
Mix and let thicken for 5 minutes and fold in 8oz cool whip

ingredientList:
12 Honey Maid Honey Grahams, Finely crushed (about 2 cups crumbs)
6 tbsp butter, melted
1 cup plus 2 tbsp sugar, divided
4 pkg (8 oz each) cream cheese, softened
1/2 cup strawberry preserves
2 cups fresh strawberries, chopped
1 tub (8 oz) cool whip, thawed
recipeText:
Mix graham crumbs, butter and ¼ cup of sugar; press onto bottom of 13x9 inch pan. Refrigerate while preparing filling

Beat cream cheese and ¾ cup of the sugar in large bowl with electric mixer until well blended. Add preserves; mix well. Place strawberries and remaining 2 tbsp. Sugar in small bowl; mash with fork. Stir strawberry mixture and whipped topping into cheese mixture. Spoon over crust; cover.

Refrigerate 4 hours or until firm. Store in refrigerator. Makes 16 servings

chapterName: Candy, Treats, and other Odds & Ends
ingredientList:
1 24-ounce package almond bark
8 ounces semisweet chocolate chips
1 cup peanut butter
24 ounces peanuts, without skins
recipeText: Melt almond bark and chocolate chips at a low temperature.  Stir in peanut butter and peanuts.  Drop on wax paper.

chapterName: Candy, Treats, and other Odds & Ends
ingredientList:
1 1/3 cups sugar
1 cup butter
1/2 cup white syrup
2 teaspoons vanilla extract
4 quarts popcorn
recipeText: Boil sugar, butter, and syrup at low heat for 10 minutes.  Add vanilla.  Pour over popcorn.

chapterName: Candy, Treats, and other Odds & Ends
ingredientList:
2 envelopes unflavored jello
1 6-ounce package flavored jello
2 1/2 cups water
recipeText:
Dissolve unflavored gelatin in 1 cup cold water. Set aside. 

In a saucepan bring 1 cup of water to a boil and add flavored jello. Bring to a boil and remove from heat. 
Add gelatin mixture. Stir and add 1/2 cup cold water. 

Pour into lightly greased pan and set in fridge (2 hours). 

Cut. Store in airtight container in fridge.

chapterName: Candy, Treats, and other Odds & Ends
recipeDescription: Makes 10 small lollipops or 30 mini candies.
ingredientList:
1 cup sugar
1/3 cup hot water
1/3 cup light corn syrup
1/2 teaspoon food coloring
1/2 teaspoon flavoring
Wilton super flex candy molds
recipeText:
Spray molds lightly with cooking spray.  Combine sugar, hot water, and corn syrup in a pan.  Place on high heat and stir until all sugar crystals are dissolved.  

Clip candy thermometer on the side of the pan and continue cooking without stirring.  When thermometer registers 300 degrees, remove pan from heat.  

Let mixture stand for 2 minutes until bubbles disappear.  Add flavoring and food coloring, stir to blend.  

Pour mixture into prepared molds and let harden at room temperature for 10 minutes.  Unmold.  Keeps for about 6 weeks.

chapterName: Candy, Treats, and other Odds & Ends
ingredientList:
13 oz pkg chocolate almond bark
1/2 cup peanut butter 
12 oz jar salted peanuts
recipeText: Microwave almond bark and peanut butter on medium heat until almond bark is melted, stirring occasionally. Add peanuts and stir well. Drop a teaspoonful of peanut butter and chocolate mixture on pan lined with waxed paper or in small paper liner.

chapterName: Candy, Treats, and other Odds & Ends
ingredientList:
1 7-ounce jar marshmallow creme
2 1/4 cups powdered sugar
3 tablespoons water
17 ounces caramels
16 ounces salted peanuts
recipeText:
Knead together the marshmallow creme and powdered sugar. Shape into small finger-like logs. Place on waxed paper-lined cookie sheet and freeze. Melt caramels with water over a double boiler (or microwave). Dip creme fingers into caramel mixture, then roll in chopped peanuts. 

Freeze until set.

Store in refrigerator.

ingredientList:
7 cups tomatoes
2 1/2 cpus chopped (big) peeled cucumbers
2 1/2 cups sweet peppers
1 cup chopped onion
1/4 - 1/2 cup hot peppers
3 gloves garlic minced
1 tsp salt
1/2 cup apple cider vinegar
2 tbs. Lime juice
recipeText: Boil slow – simmer 10 minutes – process 15 minutes

ingredientList:
8 cups tomatoes, peeled, chopped, and well drained
2 1/2 cups onions, chopped
2 cups sweet peppers, chopped
1/2 - 3/4 cup hot peppers, chopped
6 cloves garlic, minced
2 tsp. cumin
2 tsp. Pepper
2 Tbsp. Canning salt
1/3 cup sugar
1/3 cup vinegar
1 15 oz can tomato sauce
1 12 oz can tomato paste
recipeText:
Mix all together and bring to a slow boil. Continue slow boil for 10 minutes. Pack into hot jars and process in canner for 10 minutes. Remove jars and let cool overnight. Check for seal. 

Makes 7 pints

* 1/2 cup hot peppers makes a mild salsa. Adjust to taste.

ingredientList:
13 1/2 lbs tomatoes
1 1/2 lbs onions (4-5) med
1 cup sweet peppers chopped
1/4 cup hot peppers
1 cup cooking oil – extra virgin olive oil
1-2 gloves garlic
1/4 cup salt
1 tbs. Oregano
1 tbs. Basil
2 lg can tomato paste
recipeText: Add tomatoes, onions, peppers, and garlic then add rest. Cook 1 1/2 – 3 hours or until thick. Process 30-45 minutes.

ingredientList:
4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil
1 juice of lemon, divided
kosher salt
black pepper
1 teaspoon Italian seasoning or dried oregano
4 boneless skinless chicken breasts, pounded to even thickness (grill when possible)
3 slicing tomatoes
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tablespoon freshly chopped basil
4 slices mozzarella cheese
freshly grated Parmesan cheese, for serving
recipeText:
Step 1
In a small bowl, combine oil, half the lemon juice, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, and Italian seasoning (or oregano) and whisk to combine.
Transfer to a large re-sealable bag along with chicken; seal and refrigerate for 30 minutes.

Step 2
Heat grill over medium-high then add chicken, discarding excess marinade.
Grill until charred and cooked to an internal temperature of 155°-160°, about 5 to 7 minutes per side.

Step 3
Meanwhile, combine tomatoes, garlic, basil, and remaining lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper.

Step 4
While chicken is still on grill, top each breast with 1 slice mozzarella and cover until cheese is melted, 2 to 3 minutes.
Top chicken with tomato mixture.
Garnish with Parmesan and serve.

ingredientList:
6 boneless chicken breast halves, without skin
salt and pepper, to taste
garlic powder, to taste
2 cans condensed cream of chicken soup
1 can condensed cheddar cheese soup
recipeText:
Rinse chicken and sprinkle with salt, pepper and garlic powder. Mix undiluted soup and pour over chicken in a Crock Pot. Cook on low 6 to 8 hours. 

Serve over rice or noodles.

recipeDescription:
Engel family favorite
20 minutes or less to make
ingredientList:
1/2 pkg uncooked linguine noodles
1 cup fresh or frozen broccoli flowerets
2 tbs butter
1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breasts cubed
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1/2 cup milk
1/2 cup mozzarella cheese (I always add extra)
1/4 tsp pepper
recipeText:
Prepare linguine according to package directions. Add broccoli for last 4 minutes of cooking time.

In medium skillet over medium-high heat, heat butter. Add chicken and cook until browned, stirring often. Drain

Add soup, milk, cheese, pepper, and linguine mixture and cook through, stirring occasionally. Serve with additional mozzarella cheese

ingredientList:
2 (10 oz) pkg frozen, chopped broccoli
2 cans cream of chicken soup
1 cup mayonnaise
1 tsp. Lemon juice
1/2 tsp curry powder
3 cup cooked, diced chicken or turkey
1/2 cup buttered bread crumbs
1/2 c. sharp cheddar cheese
1 tbsp melted butter
recipeText:
Cook broccoli as directed. Place broccoli in bottom of 7x11 inch glass pan. 
Add chicken or turkey on top. Mix soup, mayonnaise, lemon juice, and curry powder. Pour over chicken and broccoli. Sprinkle the cheese, bread crumbs, and melted butter on top. 

Bake at 350 degrees for 45-60 minutes.

recipeDescription: This is good.  If you don't put onion and garlic in it.
ingredientList:
2 cups chicken broth
1 teaspoon chicken bouillon
1 teaspoon soy sauce
1 teaspoon onion powder
1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
1/4 teaspoon thyme
1/4 teaspoon sage
1/4 cup cold water
3 tablespoons cornstarch
1 tablespoon butter
recipeText:
Add the chicken broth, soy sauce, bouillon, and seasonings to a medium pot.

Combine the cold water and corn starch in a small Tupperware with a lid. Shake to combine.

Bring gravy to a boil and whisk in the cornstarch mixture. Reduce heat to medium low.
Continue to whisk to ensure that it blends in smoothly.

Let it gently simmer until its of desired thickness. The longer it simmers, the more concentrated the flavor will be.

Remove from heat. Swirl in one tablespoon COLD butter just before serving. This adds a silky, velvety finish.

ingredientList:
2 cans Italian tomato sauce
chicken breasts
shredded parmesan cheese
shredded mozzarella cheese
recipeText:
Put 1 can of sauce on bottom of cake pan, place chicken on top of sauce, take other can of sauce and palce on top of chicken. Place shredded parmesan cheese on top of sauce, cover and bake at 325 degrees for 1 hour. The last 10 minutes start making noodles. Cook noodles as directed

Take chicken out, cover with mozzarella cheese, cover and let set for 5 minutes. Can put back in oven that is turned off. If you let this set for a while – it is better. 

Serve chicken and sauce over noodles and serve with bread.

ingredientList:
1 10 3/4-ounce can cream of chicken soup
1 cup milk
1/2 teaspoon dried thyme
2 cups cooked, cubed chicken
1 bag frozen mixed vegetables
1 12-ounce can biscuit dough
recipeText:
In an 8-inch baking dish, mix all ingredients except dough.   Bake at 375 degrees until hot (about 20 minutes).  

Top with biscuits.  Bake as directed for biscuits until golden brown.

ingredientList:
4 boneless chicken breasts
1can 12 ounces mushroom gravy
1 cup milk
1 can mushrooms
1 envelope Italian salad dressing
Egg noodles
recipeText: In crock pot combine chicken, gravy, milk, mushrooms and dressing mix. Cover and cook on low 5-6 hours but can go longer. Cook egg noodles.

ingredientList:
Marinade
1/4 cup lime juice
1/3 cup water
2 tablespoons vegetable oil
1/8 teaspoon garlic powder
3 teaspoons vinegar
2 teaspoons soy sauce
1/2 teaspoon liquid smoke
1 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon chili powder
1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper
1/4 teaspoon pepper
1 dash onion powder

Meats & Veggies
2 boneless skinless chicken breast halves
1 pound beef sirloin steaks
1 Spanish onion, sliced
1/2 green bell pepper
1/2 red bell pepper
1 tablespoon vegetable oil
1 teaspoon soy sauce
2 tablespoons water
1/2 teaspoon lime juice
Dash pepper
Dash salt

On The Side
1/2 cup pico de gallo
1/2 cup grated Cheddar cheese
1/2 cup guacamole
1/2 cup sour cream
1 cup shredded lettuce
1/2 cup salsa
6 flour tortillas
recipeText:
Combine all marinade ingredients and marinade meat for at least two hours.  

Saute onions and bell peppers in oil for 5 minutes.  Combine soy sauce, water and lime in small bowl and pour over onions.  Add black pepper and saute until onions are translucent and dark on the edges.  Salt to taste.

Grill meat, slice into thin strips.  Add to veggie mixture. 

Steam tortillas in a moist towel in the microwave for 30 seconds and serve.

ingredientList:
1 1/3 cups French's French Fried Onions
1 pound boneless skinless chicken breast halves
1 egg, beaten
recipeText:
Crush French Fried Onions in plastic bag.

Dip chicken into egg; then coat in onion crumbs.

Bake for 20 minutes at 400 degrees until cooked through.

ingredientList:
4 boneless skinless chicken breast halves
8 small red potatoes, quartered (or use regular potatoes)
1 can condensed cream of chicken with herbs soup (10.5 oz)
1/4 cup water
1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
Dash salt
Dash pepper
Chopped fresh parsley
recipeText:
Place chicken and potatoes in a oven safe bowl.  
Mix soup, water, and garlic powder in a separate bowl.  Pour over chicken and potatoes. Cover.
 
Bake at 375 degrees for 30 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink and potatoes are done.  Garnish with parsley.  
 
Or, cook in slow cooker for 7 - 8 hours.

ingredientList:
4 boneless skinless chicken breasts
1/2 cup honey
1/2 cup BBQ sauce
2 tablespoons olive oil
1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar
2 cloves garlic minced
1/2 teaspoon black pepper
Salt to taste
recipeText:
In a bowl, whisk together honey, BBQ sauce, olive oil, apple cider vinegar, minced garlic, black pepper, and salt.

Place chicken breasts in a large resealable plastic bag. Pour the marinade over the chicken, seal the bag, and ensure each breast is well coated. Marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes, or up to 4 hours for deeper flavor.

Preheat grill to medium-high heat.

Remove chicken from the marinade, letting excess drip off. Discard the remaining marinade.

Grill chicken breasts for 6-7 minutes per side, or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F and the juices run clear.

Let the chicken rest for a few minutes before slicing. Serve hot.

ingredientList:
4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves (about 1-1/4 lbs.)
1/4 cup all-purpose flour
2 Tbsp. I Can't Believe It's Not Butter!® Spread
1 envelope Lipton® Recipe Secrets® Savory Herb with Garlic Soup Mix
1-3/4 cups water
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
recipeText:
Dip chicken in flour, shaking off excess. Melt Spread in 12-inch nonstick skillet over medium-high heat and brown chicken 4 minutes, turning once.

Stir in Lipton® Recipe Secrets® Savory Herb with Garlic Soup Mix blended with water and lemon juice.

Reduce heat to low and simmer covered 5 minutes or until sauce is slightly thickened and chicken is thoroughly cooked. Serve, if desired, with hot cooked rice.

ingredientList:
2 cups chicken, cooked
10 3/4 ounces cream of mushroom soup, canned
10 3/4 ounces cream of chicken soup, canned
21 1/2 ounces water
2 teaspoons chicken bouillon granules
1/2 teaspoon black pepper
8 buttermilk biscuits, canned (or make your own)


Biscuits:
